data.message: Eminem maybe all those thing Ha nj but he is just a man. Amazing maybe or are we just so poorly because he makes reaching your dream seem easy ur was it timing? Yes, great time line of the rise of Eminem (who swore he couldn't top what his name is...) but we expect more great things from him and that can be quite daunting and horse as; Us as fans! Clever and just a man who truly deserves legendary star who earnt the world recognition when some of us can't! Thank you, that is all! Oh, btw great round! Southpaw For Sure!
